mapper.select: SELECT sd.seckill_id,sd.user_phone,sd.state,sd.create_time, sl.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", sl.name "seckill.name", sl.number "seckill.number", sl.start_time "seckill.start_time", sl.end_time "seckill.end_time", sl.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sd INNER JOIN seckill sl ON sd.seckill_id = sl.seckill_id WHERE sd.seckill_id = #{seckillId} AND sd.user_phone = #{userPhone};
